meanings.definition: A mystical interpretation of a word or passage beyond the literal or allegorical meaning.
meanings.sent1: The anagogy of the ancient text revealed hidden spiritual truths.
meanings.sent2: She studied the anagogy of the sacred scriptures to deepen her understanding.
meanings.sent3: The anagogy of the story turned a simple tale into a mystical journey.
meanings.sent4: His anagogy of the poem transformed it into a spiritual revelation.
meanings.sent5: The anagogy of the fable made the moral lesson more profound.
